high_descs: Turn to your left and go just past the bed, then turn right and go to the head of the bed on your right.
Pick up the cylinder shaped pillow in front of you on the bed.
Turn to your left and go to the small round table.
Turn on the lamp on the small round table.
Turn left and walk to the bed, standing in front of it.
Pick up the brown pillow from the bed.
Turn around and walk to the nightstand.
Turn on the lamp on the nightstand.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the brown pillow, turn on the lamp.

high_descs: Turn left, turn right, move to the side of the bed and face it.
Pick up the pillow from the bed.
Turn around and face the lamp on the end table.
Turn on the lamp on the end table.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the pillow from the bed, then turn on the lamp next to the bed.
